Admiral Keucereus:
The Seed of Destruction is west of my base. It's ruled by Tiat, Lord of the Dragonkin and a follower of Shilen.
Tiat is kin to the Dark Dragon. Wizards tell us that when Tiat appeared on the land through the Seed, all kinds of crazy started happening -- dead dragons' souls were given bodies, and monsters took the form of Dragonkin. The Seed of Destruction is now a swarming with such creatures.
